alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 25 at 2:59PM CDT until July 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 110 degrees each afternoon through Friday. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be 5 to 15 MPH each afternoon, providing very little relief from the heat.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
